name: scss-alias-jump
description: Cmd/Ctrl+Click jump-to-definition for SCSS/Sass @use/@forward/@import paths using workspace-defined aliases.

commands.title: SCSS Alias Jump: Debug Scan Imports (@use/@forward/@import)
SCSS Alias Jump: Open Import Under Cursor
SCSS Alias Jump: Debug Click Test (Show Range Info)

scssAliasJump.debugLogging.markdownDescription: Enable verbose debug logging to the Output panel (can be noisy).

scssAliasJump.hoverWorkspaceScan.markdownDescription: Enable expensive workspace scans for hover features (class usages / %placeholder @extend references). Disable to avoid 'Loading...' in large projects.

scssAliasJump.aliases.markdownDescription: Map import aliases to absolute paths (can use VS Code variables like `${workspaceFolder}` or `${workspaceFolder:folderName}`). Example: `{ "@": "${workspaceFolder:nlrc}/src", "@scss": "${workspaceFolder:_assets}/scss" }`
